TEXT.TITLE: PERRY DRUG <PDS> FEBRUARY SALES UP 19.5 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Perry Drug Stores Inc said February sales were up 19.5 pct to 52 mln dlrs from 43 mln dlrs a year earlier, with same-store sales up five pct. It said sales for the first four months of its fiscal year were up 17.0 pct to 241 mln dlrs from 206 mln dlrs a year before, with same-store sales up five pct. Reuter
